## Getting Started

- `npm install`
- `gulp` to start a dev server

### Prerequisites

```
- Node.JS and NPM
- Jekyll
- Ruby
```

## Built With

* [Jekyll](https://jekyllrb.com/) - For a static site generator
* [Gulp](http://gulpjs.com/) - For an automated and enhanced workflow
* [Sass](http://sass-lang.com/) - For efficient and modular CSS
